overview:
Shawn V. Gruver is a Venture Capitalist and a founding partner of HFG Wealth Management, a wealth advisory and asset management firm located in Los Angeles, California. Shawn has been seeking out promising companies for over 12 years to invest during their early and growth stages that show innovative and scalable business models. Shawn supports talented entrepreneurs building visionary businesses by investing social capital and tapping into his global network of relationships to provide investor introductions, talent hiring, business development, client introductions and marketing support. His goal is to help the companies that he works with whenever and wherever it makes sense.

As a Senior Portfolio Manager & Vice President of HFG Wealth Management of UBS Financial in Los Angeles, Shawn co-manages over $500MM in assets for high net worth individuals, family offices, and foundations. Prior to UBS, Shawn was a Portfolio Manager & Vice President of Morgan Stanley also in Los Angeles, CA.

Shawn graduated from the Marshall School of Business at the University of Southern California with a BS in Business Administration, Financial Markets Emphasis.

Current personal private investments include Kayak, The Ladders, Digital Chocolate, RockYou, Loopt, Xpert Financial, PayDivvy, Saffron, CareLinx, Pathway Genomics, Sonar Media, Cuipo, and GiviGiv.
